sourcesContent:
import React from "react" class MyApp extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state = { firstName: "", lastName: "", age: "", gender: "", destination: "", dietaryRestriction: [] } this.handleChange=this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event){ const {name, value} = event.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render(){ return(







Entered information:

Your name: {this.state.firstName} {this.state.lastName}

Your age: {this.state.age}

Your gender: {this.state.gender}

Your destination: {this.state.destination}

Your dietary restriction: {this.state.dietaryRestriction}

) } } export default MyApp
